data.name: CII Goa Executive Workshop on 2020 Customs & Foreign Trade Policy in India
data.summary: The workshop will focus on rise and decline of WTO, the FTA the road ahead for Indian and world Markets, FTP Schemes and implementations of Customs Audit Regulations . The workshop will also highlight key budget changes and post budget updates relevant to the industry. This in turn would help in better understanding of Customs and make compliances much easier
